name: every-last-drop
description: Every Last Drop is the complete database management system for the small bar, or bar owner

scripts.sql-init:linux: if ! command -v mariadb 2>/dev/null >/dev/null; then echo "mariadb is not installed. Try: 'sudo apt install mariadb-server'"; else sudo mysql -u root -p < src/sql/init.sql; fi

author: Mali Truong/Charles Lewis/Brennan Wilkes
